summary: This mod makes the torch equipable as a WEAPON!
descriptionHtml:
Torch Club - By: tjbek - v.1
----------------------------



About this mod:
---------------

* This mod makes the torch equipable as a WEAPON in either of the players hands.
  (You can choose to use in just one hand or DUAL WIELD!)

* These torches cause blunt and fire damage, lighting your foes on fire!

* These torches use the mace skill perks.

* These torches are CRAFTABLE!
  (Requires 1 linen wrap, 1 charcoal, and one firewood.)

* I have started the player off with one torch club, and enough resources to
  make one more torch club.

* NOTE These torches do NOT emit light!

* Works with \"Shars Deadly Torches\", by Shar181.
  (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10552)
   
   -This is useful if you want to have one torch to emit light that you can,
    block and bashwith, and use one Torch Club to hit with.

* CAUTION: When these Torch Clubs are sheathed, they will still have a flame!


INSTALLATION:
-------------

* I did not make a FOMOD installer for this mod. I do not use FOMOD.

* Manually install by copying the contents of the data folder to the data
  folder in your Skyrim dir. 
  
  (NOTE: The texture file is optional; it is just a glowmap that I made for
         myself a couple months ago. It makes the top of the torch glow blue.
         It is a 1024 pixel texture and is NOT perfect. You will see some other
         colors glow below the blue and I could not fix it.)



What I would like to fix:
-------------------------

* I would like to remove the flame from the Torch Clubs when sheathed.

* I would like to have the torches emit light.

  - If you know how to fix these things or figure it out before me please let me know.



Closer:
------

* I hope you enjoy this mod. I\'m not the most experienced modder, but all suggestions,
  constructive criticizms, and compliments are welcome.

* I\'m not here for fame but if you do like my mod please endorse to let me know that
  my time/work is appreciated, and so that others may be able to find this mod and like
  it too.
         
         ~TY
